customer_name: Dennis L and Sarah A Hershberger
site_name: Dennis L and Sarah A Hershberger

citations.narrative:
The facility has not administered rabies vaccinations for 6 adult dogs (microchip numbers 4873, 1880, 9750, 8226, 0049,
6071) in accordance with the schedule outlined in the program of veterinary care. Failure to follow a written and Attending
Veterinarian approved schedule for vaccinations of contagious and/or deadly diseases can result in an increased risk of
disease exposure in the dogs. The facility must ensure that vaccinations for contagious and/or deadly diseases of dogs
(including rabies, parvovirus and distemper) and sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests (including fleas,
worms, coccidia, giardia, and heartworm) in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending veterinarian are
administered. Correct by, 22-September-2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The facility has not administered rabies vaccinations for 6 adult dogs (microchip numbers 4873, 1880, 9750, 8226, 0049, 
6071) in accordance with the schedule outlined in the program of veterinary care. Failure to follow a written and Attending 
Veterinarian approved schedule for vaccinations of contagious and/or deadly diseases can result in an increased risk of 
disease exposure in the dogs. The facility must ensure that vaccinations for contagious and/or deadly diseases of dogs 
(including rabies, parvovirus and distemper) and sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests (including fleas, 
worms, coccidia, giardia, and heartworm) in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending veterinarian are 
administered. Correct by, 22-September-2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a Facility Representative.
